articles.author: Frances Vinall
articles.title: South Africa denies illegal miners food and water to force them out - The Washington Post
articles.description: Officials are blocking access to basic supplies for hundreds of people underground in a northwest mine shaft as part of a crackdown on miners.
articles.content: South African authorities have been criticized over a controversial tactic to force illegal miners hiding more than a mile underground in the countrys northwest to the surface by cutting off their ac… [+5942 chars]
